summary: Build a website and mobile app for the YouTube channel “Keep Going Classes” to serve students, share articles, open admissions, and provide contact information.
architectural_notes: Contact section/page content should include WhatsApp contact numbers: 9889144312 and 9838784245 (label as 'Wapp'/WhatsApp).
Update address to: Utelwa Jagdishpur, Musafirkhana, Amethi, Uttar Pradesh, India 227809.
User requested setting up a custom domain to improve accessibility/reach (reduce reliance on icp0.io link).
known_issues: Production deployment reported an internal configuration issue; may require re-run or Caffeine team support.
Some users/networks encounter "Canister id not resolved" when opening the icp0.io URL (likely ISP/network blocking ICP), impacting accessibility.

existing_features.title: Create a responsive website/web app for the YouTube channel "Keep Going Classes" with the tagline presented in English and clear navigation for students.
Implement an Articles section where students can browse and read published articles.
Add an admin-only interface to create, edit, publish/unpublish, and delete articles using Internet Identity authentication.
Implement an Admissions feature allowing students to submit admission/enrollment requests via a form.
Add a Contact section/page that shows the creator's contact information and allows easy copying/launching (e.g., click-to-email, click-to-call when appropriate).
Apply a cohesive, distinctive visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) appropriate for an educational/coaching brand and enforce it consistently across all pages.
Provide a "mobile app-like" experience within the responsive web app (PWA-style basics): add installable metadata and a home-screen icon so students can save it to their device.
Add a simple Home page that explains what Keep Going Classes offers (academics + competitive exam preparation) and provides clear calls to action for Articles and Admissions.
Update the Contact page to display the user’s provided contact numbers: WhatsApp: 9889144312 and Phone: 9838784245.
Remove/replace any placeholder contact phone number currently shown on the Contact page so only the provided numbers are presented as the primary phone/WhatsApp contacts.

Add a new public page named "Courses & Exams" that lists the available school classes (Class 9th, Class 10th, Class 11th, Class 12th) and competitive exams (NDA, CDSE, AFCAT, Airforce Exam, Navy Exam) in clear sections, using English headings and labels.
Update site navigation to include a link to the new "Courses & Exams" page in both the primary navigation and the footer quick links.

Update the Admissions form "Program of Interest" dropdown options to include the user-requested class levels and exam prep programs: Class 9th, Class 10th, Class 11th, Class 12th, NDA, CDSE, AFCAT, Airforce Exam, Navy Exam (use English labels).
Add a new public "YouTube" page/tab that is accessible from the main navigation and provides in-app access to the Keep Going Classes YouTube channel videos.
Implement a simple, maintainable YouTube channel configuration that the app uses for all YouTube links/embeds (header/footer social link and the new YouTube page).
Add/refresh the Keep Going Classes logo as a generated static asset and ensure it is used consistently in the header and PWA metadata.

Make the frontend work correctly when served from either the root of a custom domain (e.g., https://yourdomain.com) or from a subpath deployment (e.g., https://caffeine.icp0.io/app/keep-going-classes), by ensuring internal navigation and static asset URLs do not rely on absolute root paths.

Update PWA metadata and asset references to be compatible with custom domains and subpath hosting by avoiding hardcoded root-based URLs in frontend/index.html and frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest (including manifest href, icons, and start_url).

Add custom-domain compatibility for Internet Identity by serving a well-known configuration file from the frontend (static asset) that enables the app origin(s) to be used with Internet Identity on a custom domain.

Add a short, user-facing documentation page/file in the repository that explains how to connect a custom domain to the deployed app, including the required DNS records and any Internet Identity-related well-known configuration that must be present on the domain.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a website for Keep Going Classes for students to access content and information
Create a mobile app for Keep Going Classes for students to access content and information
Add articles/content publishing section to share articles with students
Add online admissions/enrollment feature on the website/app
Add contact information section/page (e.g., phone/email/address/social links)
Update branding: create/add a logo and set tagline to "PADHAI KA ADDA"
Update contact/address details to: Utelwa Jagdishpur, Musafirkhana, Amethi, Uttar Pradesh, India 227809
Add a Courses/Classes & Exams section listing Class 9th/10th/11th/12th and exams (NDA, CDSE, AFCAT, Airforce Exam, Navy Exam)
Set up/connect a custom domain (e.g., keepgoingclasses.com) for the deployed app/website
Add a YouTube tab/page linking the Keep Going Classes YouTube channel and showing all channel videos within the app/website
